definition: to abolish/to abandon/to abrogate/to discard/to depose/to oust/crippled/abandoned/waste

sentences.english: It is the heavy metals contained in the waste effluent that can cause an environmental or disposal problem.
sentences.chinese: 就是流出廢液中的重金屬能導致環境或處理問題。

sentences.english: Any waste liquid or material shall be handled per the specific plant procedure.
sentences.chinese: 任何廢液或廢物料要根據全廠特定程序進行處理。

sentences.english: The method has been applied in the determination of Zn2+in wastewater with a satisfactory result.
sentences.chinese: 應用該方法進行了鍍鋅廢液中鋅的測定，結果滿意。

sentences.english: In addition, Large amounts of untreated industrial waste liquids find their way into rivers and lakes.
sentences.chinese: 許多末經處理的工業廢液流入河流和湖泊。

sentences.english: Trialkyphosphine oxides(TRPO) is an extractant used in the treatment of high level liquid waste.
sentences.chinese: 三烷基氧化膦是用於處理高放廢液的萃取劑。

sentences.english: The remaining liquid, which contains the leftover salts, shoots out of the system at high pressure.
sentences.chinese: 而剩下的高鹽分廢液，則用高壓從系統中抽走。

sentences.english: Studies on biochemical treatment of CTMP effluent by activated sludge process were carried out.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了活性污泥法處理雲杉CTMP廢液的試驗。

sentences.english: The new method of producing basic copper carbonate from waste etching solution containing copper.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了利用含銅蝕刻廢液合成鹼式碳酸銅的新工藝。

sentences.english: Chemical copper and nikel plating wastewater treatment techniques were recommended.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了化學鍍銅與鍍鎳老化廢液的處理技術。

sentences.english: In this paper, a new method of manufacturing cryolite from liquid waste of lithium factory was developed.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了一條回收鋰廠廢液製備冰晶石的新工藝。

sentences.english: Practices proof, vinasse and distillery slops close recycling all reuse is practicable.
sentences.chinese: 實踐證明，酒糟廢液閉路循環全回用是可行的。

sentences.english: Waste emulsion was treated by method of co-coagulation flotation and adsorption.
sentences.chinese: 採用共凝聚氣浮破乳吸附法處理乳化廢液。

sentences.english: The research results of recovering copper by electrowinning from concentrated cyanide solution were described.
sentences.chinese: 敘述了從富集氰化廢液中電解回收銅的試驗研究結果。

sentences.english: The source of organic waste liquid and the application status of CWM are summarized.
sentences.chinese: 對有機廢液的來源及水煤漿的應用現狀進行綜述。

sentences.english: The process conditions of reclaiming chromium from electrodeposition chromium waste liquid using hydrazine hydrate as reducing agent were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了用水合肼回收電沉積鉻廢液中鉻的工藝條件。

sentences.english: The component content of phosethyl-Al waste liquor is determined.
sentences.chinese: 測定了乙磷鋁廢液中各成分含量。
